title: 陳雲：浸大普通話畢業規定 官方資助學校普教中 乃涉及種族歧視

replies.msg:
陳雲：陳雲的法律鬥爭政術。除了昨日我說的浸會學校的普通話畢業規定可以控告歧視之外，關於官方資助學校的普教中，其實也是涉及種族歧視的，是歧視香港那些不以普通話為母語的香港學童，令到他們花費額外的語文學習時間，而且中文成績有機會比起大陸學童差（這是有數據支持的）。

普教中學校太多，也剝削香港家長的教育選擇機會。

這種官司，如果有人去平等機會委員會投訴或直接入禀法庭，是打得贏的。

如果我是議員，我出任的第一日就會打這場官司，控告特區政府。不過，香港人喜歡泛民，就由率先主張普教中的泛民出面打官司啦。

香港的粵語中文教師，也可以去法庭控告教育局，令他們喪失平等的求職機會。

Wan Chin 分享了 Chung-Tai Cheng 鄭松泰的帖子。



致 平等機會委員會：

【調查浸會大學學位畢業要求涉種族歧視事宜】

香港浸會大學(浸大)將普通話能力列為學生畢業的其中一項要求，許多學生都認為自己遭校方刁難，一六年四月學生會更為此發起公投要求取消，獲得一千三百八十二票的壓倒性支持。

上述事件並非單純的浸大校政，更可能是種族歧視。浸會大學近年追求國際化，積極招徠世界各地的非華裔學生或交流生，據悉校方並無要求他們符合上述的普通話能力標準。浸大有否將粵語能力列為大陸學生的畢業要求，亦可能引起關注。

《種族歧視條例》訂明禁止教育範疇的種族歧視， 貴會一四年亦曾經提出廢除第26(2)條對教育機構的豁免。然而，浸大對本地學生施行更多的畢業要求，甚至自動豁免對大陸學生與外地生的粵語及普通話能力要求，等如優待非本地學生。對本地學生的種族歧視，勢將由校園蔓延至整個學界和社會，危害本地青年的發展機會， 貴會絕不應置若罔聞。本辦事處希望 貴會能夠盡責地調查浸大是否對本地學生和非本地學生有差別對待，還本地學生一個公道。

立法會鄭松泰議員辦事處
二○一八年一月十七日

(副本致：香港浸會大學)

普通話能力畢業要求
Putonghua Proficiency Requirement for Graduation
(With effect from 2017-2018)

Undergraduate students are required to reach foundation Putonghua proficiency before
they graduate. Students must fulfil one of the following requirements for graduation:

(a) Pass a 3-unit Putonghua course offered by the Language Centre

(LANG1026 Practical Putonghua*, LANG1006 Intermediate Putonghua, LANG2055 Advanced Putonghua or
LANG3016 Advanced-Plus Putonghua)

[*It is a replacement course of LANG1005 Elementary Putonghua, which is still a valid course for fulfilling the
requirement. Students who have completed either LANG1005 Elementary Putonghua (which focuses on Pinyin in
the first few weeks) or LANG1026 Practical Putonghua (which focuses on communication skills) are eligible to
enroll in intermediate courses.]

OR

(b) Take a 25-hour non-credit bearing preparation course (PUTO2270) AND pass the Putonghua Proficiency Test
conducted by the Language Centre (upon completion of PUTO2270). Students who fail the test must take one of
the 3-unit Putonghua courses listed in point (a) above

[For details on the Putonghua courses and the Putonghua Proficiency Test, please visit:
http://lc.hkbu.edu.hk/course_pth.php]

豁免普通話能力畢業要求

Exemption from the Putonghua Proficiency Requirement for Graduation:
Students may apply for exemption if they meet one of the following criteria:

a) Non-Chinese speaking students such as those from foreign countries and international schools in Hong Kong who
have been granted exemption from taking the 3-unit Chinese Language course of the General Education Programme
(GCLA1005 University Chinese) (母語非中文，並獲豁免修讀 GCLA1005 的學生，例如部分外國學生及香港
國際學校的學生) or those who have been required to take the 3-unit Chinese Language course of the General
Education Programme (GCLA1016 University Chinese (Syllabus B)) (略懂中文，必須修讀 GCLA1016 的學生)

b) Students who have attended the Chinese Language examination in the Tertiary Entrance Examination or
Multi-admission Programme conducted by the Ministry of Education in the Mainland or Taiwan respectively
(曾參加內地教育部「普通高等學校招生考試」或台灣教育部「多元入學方案」中國語文科考試的學生)

c) Students who have attained Grade C or above in the Hong Kong Certificate of Education Examination Putonghua
subject (在香港中學會考普通話科取得 C 級或以上的學生)

d) Students who have passed the Test of Proficiency in Putonghua conducted by the Hong Kong Examinations and
Assessment Authority (在香港考試及評核局普通話水平測試取得及格成績的學生)

e) Students who have attained Third Class, Grade A or above in the Putonghua Shuiping Ceshi (a National Putonghua
Proficiency Test) (在國家語委普通話水平測試取得三級甲等或以上的學生)

f) Students who have obtained a qualification that is deemed to be equivalent to one of the above by the Language
Centre (其他取得相等程度的學生，將按個別情況處理)

g) Students who have passed the Diagnostic cum Exemption Test (DET)#
conducted by the Language Centre

[#Details of the DET will be available on the Language Centre’s website in early September 2017.]
